snippet.title: The Legend of Zelda - Echoes of Aurelia Teaser Video 3
snippet.description:
Part 3 brings you something ZC has never (as far as I'm aware) seen before - a custom save system and game over animation.

Discussion Topic:
http://www.purezc.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=44571
http://www.purezc.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=44855

Tileset by Radien and Akkabus
Screen design and item sprites by Sheik
Scripting by Joe123
